company.name: ZARTYX
company.description: Zartyx is a cutting-edge technology company dedicated to building innovative solutions that transform industries. We specialize in AI/ML development, full-stack applications, IoT systems, and blockchain technology. Our mission is to harness emerging technologies to create products that make a real-world impact, empowering businesses and individuals to reach their full potential through intelligent automation and seamless digital experiences.

technologyArsenal.title: Technology Arsenal
technologyArsenal.subtitle: Hardware, Software, Tools & Domains I've Mastered

categories.title: Hardware & Electronics
categories.description: Physical computing, embedded systems, robotics, and IoT devices I've built and programmed

items.title: Arduino Development
items.description: Development of IOT devices and automation systems using Arduino Uno, Nano, and Mega boards
items.detailedDesc: Built multiple IoT devices using Arduino Uno, Nano, and Mega boards. Created smart home automation systems, weather stations, and robotic arms with servo motors and sensors.

items.title: Virtual Keyboard
items.description: Wanna type in air? Try this virtual keyboard built using IR sensors to capture finger movements and project them as keystrokes. In future can be integrated with Hologram
items.detailedDesc: Built a virtual keyboard using IR sensors to capture finger movements and project them as keystrokes. Can be integrated with holograms in the future.

items.title: ESP32 WiFi Systems
items.description: Wireless sensors, remote monitoring, and cloud-connected devices using ESP32 and ESP8266 modules
items.detailedDesc: Created wireless sensor networks and remote monitoring systems using ESP32 and ESP8266. Built real-time data logging systems with cloud connectivity and mobile app integration.

items.title: Pulse Oximeter
items.description: Created a low-cost pulse oximeter for reading patient heart rate and oxygen saturation levels to assist in health monitoring.
items.detailedDesc: Created a low-cost pulse oximeter for reading patient heart rate and oxygen saturation levels to assist in health monitoring.

items.title: Intel RealSense Camera
items.description: 3D scanning, depth perception, and spatial mapping using Intel RealSense depth cameras
items.detailedDesc: Worked with Intel RealSense depth cameras for 3D scanning, object recognition, and spatial mapping applications. Integrated with computer vision pipelines for advanced perception systems.

items.title: Leap Motion Sensor
items.description: Hand tracking, gesture recognition, and interactive control systems using Leap Motion sensor
items.detailedDesc: Developed gesture recognition applications using Leap Motion sensor for hand tracking and gesture-based control systems. Created interactive experiences and VR/AR applications.

items.title: Microsoft Kinect
items.description: Motion sensing, skeletal tracking, and interactive applications using Microsoft Kinect
items.detailedDesc: Utilized Microsoft Kinect for motion sensing, skeletal tracking, and interactive applications. Developed games, fitness apps, and interactive installations using Kinect SDK.

categories.title: AI & Machine Learning
categories.description: Deep learning models, computer vision, NLP, and AI-powered applications I've developed

items.title: AI
items.description: Neural networks, image classification, and predictive models using TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch
items.detailedDesc: Built neural networks for image classification, object detection, and time series prediction. Trained custom models for real-world applications including medical image analysis and predictive maintenance.

items.title: ML
items.description: Worked on Supervised (SVM, Random Forest), Unsupervised, Neural networks, image classification, and deep learning models
items.detailedDesc: Worked on Supervised (SVM, Random Forest, Decision Trees), Unsupervised learning (K-means, PCA), Neural networks, image classification, and deep learning models for various applications.

items.title: RL
items.description: Have worked on Reinforcement learning models for game playing and decision making systems using PPO and other algorithms
items.detailedDesc: Developed Reinforcement learning models for game playing and decision making systems using PPO (Proximal Policy Optimization) and other algorithms.

items.title: Transformers & NLP
items.description: Transformer models including MT5, BERT for text generation, translation, and NLP tasks
items.detailedDesc: Implemented transformer models including MT5 (Multilingual T5) for text generation, translation, and summarization tasks. Fine-tuned BERT models for various NLP applications.

items.title: Computer Vision Systems
items.description: Object detection, face recognition, and real-time tracking using YOLO, OpenCV, and CNN architectures
items.detailedDesc: Developed real-time object detection systems using YOLO and OpenCV. Created face recognition attendance systems, gesture control interfaces, and automated quality inspection systems.

categories.title: Full-Stack Web Development
categories.description: Modern web applications, APIs, and platforms built with cutting-edge frameworks and databases

items.title: HTML, CSS & JS
items.description: Responsive websites and interactive web applications using core web technologies
items.detailedDesc: Built responsive websites and web applications using core web technologies. Created interactive user interfaces, animations, and dynamic content with vanilla JavaScript.

items.title: Frontend Frameworks
items.description: SPAs, dashboards, and interactive web applications using React, Vue.js, and Angular
items.detailedDesc: Created responsive single-page applications with React.js, Vue.js, and Angular. Built e-commerce platforms, dashboards, and social networking features.

items.title: React.js
items.description: SPAs, dashboards, and interactive web applications with React and Redux
items.detailedDesc: Created responsive single-page applications with React.js, Redux for state management, and modern UI libraries. Built e-commerce platforms, dashboards, and social networking features.

items.title: Backend
items.description: RESTful APIs, server-side logic, and database management with MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, and Supabase
items.detailedDesc: Developed RESTful APIs and server-side applications using various backend technologies. Implemented authentication systems, database management with MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, and Supabase, and scalable architectures.

items.title: Node.js
items.description: RESTful APIs, microservices, and real-time applications with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
items.detailedDesc: Developed RESTful APIs and microservices using Node.js and Express. Implemented authentication systems, real-time features with WebSockets, and scalable backend architectures with MongoDB and MySQL.

items.title: Flask
items.description: Lightweight web applications and API backends with Flask and database integrations
items.detailedDesc: Built web applications and APIs using Flask framework. Created lightweight and efficient backend systems with various extensions and integrations with databases.

items.title: Python Web Frameworks
items.description: Django CMS, Flask APIs, and data-driven applications with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Supabase
items.detailedDesc: Built full-stack web applications with Django and Flask frameworks. Created CMS systems, data analytics dashboards, and API backends with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Supabase databases.

items.title: Streamlit
items.description: Interactive data applications and machine learning demos with Streamlit
items.detailedDesc: Created interactive data applications and dashboards using Streamlit. Built machine learning demos, data visualization tools, and rapid prototyping applications.

categories.title: Mobile App Development
categories.description: Cross-platform and native mobile applications for iOS and Android

items.title: Flutter Development
items.description: Beautiful, fast mobile apps with single codebase using Flutter and Dart
items.detailedDesc: Created beautiful mobile apps using Flutter with Material Design and Cupertino widgets. Built real-time chat applications, e-commerce apps, and location-based services.

items.title: Android Studio
items.description: Native Android apps with custom UI and hardware integration using Android Studio
items.detailedDesc: Developed native Android applications using Android Studio. Built various mobile apps with Java, implementing custom UI components and integrating with device hardware.

items.title: Java App Development
items.description: Native Android applications with Java programming and Android SDK
items.detailedDesc: Created native Android applications using Java. Implemented various mobile app functionalities, user interfaces, and backend integrations for Android devices.

items.title: Kotlin App Development
items.description: Modern Android apps with Kotlin and Jetpack components
items.detailedDesc: Developed modern Android applications using Kotlin. Built efficient and concise mobile apps with Kotlin's modern language features and Android Jetpack components.

categories.title: Cloud Computing & DevOps
categories.description: Cloud infrastructure, containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation

items.title: AWS Cloud Infrastructure
items.description: Scalable deployments with serverless architecture on AWS
items.detailedDesc: Deployed scalable applications on AWS using EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS. Implemented auto-scaling, load balancing, and serverless architectures for cost-effective solutions.

items.title: Google Cloud Platform
items.description: Cloud computing, data processing, and ML pipelines on Google Cloud Platform
items.detailedDesc: Utilized GCP services including Google Cloud Functions, BigQuery, and Cloud Storage for data processing and application deployment. Implemented machine learning pipelines with Vertex AI.

items.title: Container Orchestration
items.description: Docker containers with Kubernetes deployment and orchestration
items.detailedDesc: Containerized applications using Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes. Set up microservices architecture with automated deployment, scaling, and monitoring systems.

items.title: Automated Deployment
items.description: CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery with GitHub Actions and Jenkins
items.detailedDesc: Automated build, test, and deployment workflows using GitHub Actions, Jenkins, and GitLab CI. Implemented continuous integration for faster development cycles and reliable releases.

categories.title: Blockchain & Web3
categories.description: Decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain solutions

items.title: Smart Contract Development
items.description: Ethereum DApps, DeFi, and NFT platforms with Solidity
items.detailedDesc: Developed and deployed smart contracts on Ethereum using Solidity. Created DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, and token systems with comprehensive security audits.

items.title: Decentralized Applications
items.description: Web3 apps with blockchain integration and IPFS storage
items.detailedDesc: Built decentralized applications with Web3 integration. Created wallets, decentralized exchanges, and governance platforms with MetaMask integration and IPFS storage.

items.title: Ryx Cryptocurrency
items.description: Custom cryptocurrency with blockchain, wallet, and mining implementation
items.detailedDesc: Developed Ryx, my own cryptocurrency with custom blockchain implementation. Created wallet applications, mining software, and exchange integrations for the Ryx ecosystem.

categories.title: Data Science & Analytics

items.title: Data Analysis & Processing
items.description: Statistical analysis and predictive modeling with Python, Pandas, and NumPy
items.detailedDesc: Performed extensive data analysis using Python, Pandas, and NumPy. Created insights from large datasets, statistical modeling, and predictive analytics for business decisions.

items.title: Data Visualization
items.description: Interactive dashboards and business intelligence with Tableau and Power BI
items.detailedDesc: Created interactive dashboards and visualizations using Tableau, Power BI, and Plotly. Built real-time monitoring systems and executive dashboards for data-driven decision making.

items.title: Big Data Technologies
items.description: Distributed computing and stream processing with Spark and Hadoop
items.detailedDesc: Worked with large-scale data processing using Apache Spark and Hadoop. Implemented ETL pipelines and real-time stream processing for high-volume data applications.

categories.title: Design & UI/UX

items.title: UI/UX Design in Figma
items.description: Prototypes, design systems, and user interfaces with Figma
items.detailedDesc: Designed complete user interfaces and interactive prototypes in Figma. Created design systems, component libraries, and collaborated with development teams for pixel-perfect implementations.

items.title: Adobe Creative Suite
items.description: Graphics, illustrations, and motion design with Adobe Creative Suite
items.detailedDesc: Created graphics, illustrations, and marketing materials using Photoshop, Illustrator, and After Effects. Produced video content and motion graphics for brand campaigns.

items.title: Canva & DaVinci Resolve
items.description: Graphic design with Canva and professional video editing with DaVinci Resolve
items.detailedDesc: Created professional designs and video content using Canva for graphic design and DaVinci Resolve for video editing and color grading. Produced marketing materials, social media content, and video presentations.

items.detailedDesc: Implemented security best practices, penetration testing, and vulnerability assessments. Developed secure authentication systems and encryption protocols for sensitive data protection.

items.title: Game Development
items.description: 2D/3D games with Unity and Unreal Engine
items.detailedDesc: Created 2D and 3D games using Unity and Unreal Engine. Developed gameplay mechanics, physics systems, and multiplayer networking for engaging gaming experiences.

items.title: AR/VR Experiences

items.detailedDesc: Built augmented and virtual reality experiences using Unity XR and ARCore. Created immersive training simulations, virtual showrooms, and AR filters for mobile applications.
